text:
The Spectacle of Grief

A chaotic crowd gathers, tension in the air.  
Katerina Ivanovna: “Is this a spectacle for you?”  
Katerina Ivanovna: “Respect the dead!”  
Katerina Ivanovna: “Get away!”  

---  

Katerina coughs, her anger rising.  
Katerina Ivanovna: “No business to die!”  
Madame Lippevechsel: “To the hospital with him!”  
Katerina Ivanovna: “Amalia Ludwigovna, remember your place!”

**PAGE SUMMARY:** Katerina Ivanovna confronts the crowd and the landlady about the disrespect shown towards her injured husband, Marmeladov.
